content: क्षेत्रिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [क्षेत्र-इनि] {@--1@} Owning a field; cultivating land. {@--2@} Agricultural. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} An agriculturist, a cultivator; <ls>Y. 2. 161.</ls> {@--2@} A (nominal) husband; <ls>Ś. 5.</ls> {@--3@} The soul. {@--4@} The Supreme soul; <ls>Bg. 13. 33.</ls>
